            }



            String.prototype.en_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/à§¦/g,'0')
                        .replace(/à§§/g,'1')
                        .replace(/à§¨/g,'2')
                        .replace(/à§©/g,'3')
                        .replace(/à§ª/g,'4')
                        .replace(/à§«/g,'5')
                        .replace(/à§¬/g,'6')
                        .replace(/à§­/g,'7')
                        .replace(/à§®/g,'8')
                        .replace(/à§¯/g,'9');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-td-index]",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var filter = [];

                $(this).parents("form").find("[data-td-index]").each(function (index){
                    if ($(this).val().trim()!="" && $(this).val()!=null){
                        filter.push(
                                {
                                    "bn": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number(),
                                    "en": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number(),
                                    "td": $(this).data("td-index")
                                }
                        )
                     }
                })


                var trs = table.find("tbody tr");

                $.each(trs, function (index, tr) {
                    var rowShow = true;
                    $.each(filter, function (ind, val){
                        console.log(val);
                        var td = $(tr).find("td").get(val["td"]);
                        var text = $(td).text();

                        if (text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["en"]) > -1
                        || text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["bn"]) > -1){
                            rowShow = rowShow && true;
                        }else{
                            rowShow = false;
                        }
                    })
                    if (rowShow==true){
                        $(tr).show();
                    }else{
                        $(tr).hide();
                    }
                } )

            })

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-search]",function () {


                var searchContent = $(this).data("search");

                var filter1 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number();
                var filter2 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number();


                var rows = $(document).find(searchContent);


                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {

                    var row = rows[i];
                    if (row) {
                        if ($(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter1) > -1
                                ||$(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter2) > -1
                        ) {
                            $(row).show();
                        } else {
                            $(row).hide();
                        }
                    }
                }
            })

            $(document).find(".removableRowTable").each(function (index) {
                console.log($(this).find("tbody tr").length);
                $(this).find("tbody").each(function () {
                    if ($(this).find("tr").length<=1){
                        $(this).remove();
                    }
                })
            })


            $(document).on("reset","form",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var tr = table.find("tbody tr");
                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < tr.length; i++) {

                    tr[i].style.display = "";

                }
            })

        });

        $(document).ready(function($) {
            $('body').scrollToTop({
                distance: 200,
                speed: 1000,
                easing: 'linear',
                animation: 'fade', // fade, slide, none
                animationSpeed: 500,

                mobile: {
                    width: 768,
                    distance: 100,
                    speed: 1000,
                    easing: 'easeInOutElastic',
                    animation: 'slide',
                    animationSpeed: 200
                },

                trigger: null, // Set a custom triggering element. Can be an HTML string or jQuery object
                target: null, // Set a custom target element for scrolling to. Can be element or number
                text: '<i class="fa fa-chevron-circle-up" aria-hidden="true"></i>Top', // Text for element, can contain HTML

                skin: null,
                throttle: 250,

                namespace: 'scrollToTop'
            });
        });
        function validateForm(){
            var name=document.contactUsForm.name.value;
            var message=document.contactUsForm.message.value;
            var email=document.contactUsForm.email.value;

            if (name==null || name==""){
                alert("Name can't be blank");
                return false;
            }else if(email==null || email==""){
                alert("Email can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
            else if(message==null || message==""){
                alert("Message can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
        }

        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12">
                <div class="text-center">
                    <h3>

                        The Municipal Taxation Act, 1881 

                        
                        
                    </h3>
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            <h4 style="color: #fff;"> (
                                
                                    
                                    
                                        
                                            
                                            ACT
                                        
                                        NO. XI OF 1881
                                    
                                

                                )
                            </h4>
                        
                    
                </div>

    </section>
    <section class="bt-act-section-search ">
        <div class="row">

                    <a href="#" onclick="window.history.back();return false;"><i class="fa fa-arrow-left" title="Back"
                                                                                 aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
                <p class="pull-right print-center publish-date">
                    [ 25th February, 1881   ]
                </p>
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    
    <section
            class="padding-bottom-20 ">
        <div class="row margin-top-20 ">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 lineremove">
                <button class="printIco print-only pull-right" onclick="window.print();return false;"
                        style="width: 72px;height: 80px;"><i
                        class="fa fa-print" style="font-size: 40px;"></i></button>
                
                    

                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="col-md-2"></div>
                            <div class="col-md-10 text-center act-role-style">
                                
                                <strong>
                                    <span class='footnote' href='#' title='Throughout this Act, except otherwise provided, the word â€œGovernmentâ€ was substituted, for the words â€œProvincial Governmentâ€ or â€œCentral Governmentâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >1</a></sup></span></span>â™£An Act to give power to prohibit the levy of municipal taxes in certain cases.

                                    
                                    
                                </strong>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row">
                            
                            
                            
                                <div class="col-md-2">&nbsp;&nbsp;Preamble</div>
                            

                            <div class="col-md-10">

                                
                                <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>   WHEREAS it is expedient to empower the Government to prohibit, in certain cases, the levy of municipal taxes payable by persons in the military, naval or air-force service or by the Government;  It is hereby enacted as follows:- <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>

                                
                                
                            </div>
                        </div>
                    
                    
                    
                
            </div>
        </div>
    </section>
    <section class="padding-bottom-20 bg-striped ">
        
        
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Short title

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    1. This Act may be called the <a title='Municipal Taxation Act, 1881' href='/act-44.html'>Municipal Taxation Act, 1881</a>.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            

Local extent

                            
                            
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    It extends to the whole of  <span class='footnote'  title='The word "Bangladesh" was substituted, for the word "Pakistan" by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >2</a></sup></span></span>[Bangladesh].

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            â€œMunicipal Committeeâ€ defined

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    2. In this Act â€œMunicipal Committeeâ€  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œincludes a Paurashava or a Municipal Corporationâ€ were substituted, for the words â€œincludes a Municipal Corporationâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >3</a></sup></span></span>[includes a Paurashava or a Municipal Corporation] or a body of Municipal Commissioners constituted by or under the provisions of any enactment for the time being in force. 

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Power to prohibit levy of tax

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    3. Notwithstanding anything contained in any enactment for the time being in force, the Government may, by an order in writing, prohibit the levy by a Municipal Committee of any specified tax-	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(a)	payable by any person subject to  <span class='footnote'  title='The words, commas and figures â€œthe Army Act, 1952, the Naval Discipline Ordinance, 1961 or the Air Force Act, 1953â€ were substituted, for the words, commas, figures and bracket â€œthe Army Act, the Indian Army Act, 1911 or the Pakistan Army Act, 1952, the Naval Discipline Act or that Act as modified by the Pakistan Navy (Discipline) Act, 1934, the Air Force Act or the Indian Air Force Act, 1932 or the Pakistan Air Force Act, 1953â€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >4</a></sup></span></span>[the <a title='Army Act, 1952' href='/act-248.html'>Army Act, 1952</a>, the Naval Discipline Ordinance, 1961 or 	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>the <a title='Air Force Act, 1953' href='/act-256.html'>Air Force Act, 1953</a>]  who is compelled by the exigencies of Military, Naval or Air-force duty to reside within the limits of a municipality;	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	The Government may, by a like order, rescind any such prohibition.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Power of Government to prohibit levy of taxes on it

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	3A. 	Notwithstanding anything in any enactment for the time being in force, the Government may by an order in writing prohibit the levy by a Municipal Committee of any specified tax payable by the Government and may by a like order rescind any such prohibition.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Government to pay taxes referred to in section 3

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	4. So long as any order made under section 3, prohibiting the levy of a tax on any person mentioned in that section remains in force, the Government shall be liable to pay to the Municipal Committee mentioned in the order the amount which otherwise would have been payable to such Committee by such person:<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Provided that the Government shall not be liable to pay any sum in respect of any horse which such person is bound, by the regulations of the service to which he belongs, to keep.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Payments to be made in lieu of taxes referred to in section 3A

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	5. So long as any order made under section 3A prohibiting the levy of any tax payable by the Government, remains in force, the said Government shall be liable to pay to the Municipal Committee, in lieu of such tax, such sums (if any) as an officer from time to time appointed in this behalf by the Government may, having regard to all the circumstances of the case, from time to time determine to be fair and reasonable.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Decision of questions arising under this Act




                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	6. If any question arises whether any duty is military, naval or air-force duty within the meaning of this Act, the decision of the Government thereon shall be conclusive.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>If any question arises whether any person is compelled as aforesaid to reside within the limits of a municipality or is bound as aforesaid to keep any horse, the decision thereon of such authority as the Government may, from time to time, appoint in this behalf shall be conclusive.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>

            <img src="/resources/website/assets/img/line2.jpg">
        </div>
        <div class="footnoteListAll">
            <ul class="list-unstyled">
                <li class='footnoteList'><h6 class='word-formet'> <sup class='en'>1</sup> </h6>Throughout this Act, except otherwise provided, the word â€œGovernmentâ€ was substituted, for the words â€œProvincial Governmentâ€ or â€œCentral Governmentâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the <a title='Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973' href='/act-430.html'>Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973</a> (Act No. VIII of 1973)</li> <li class='footnoteList'><h6 class='word-formet'> <sup class='en'>2</sup> </h6>The word "Bangladesh" was substituted, for the word "Pakistan" by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the <a title='Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973' href='/act-430.html'>Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973</a> (Act No. VIII of 1973)</li> <li class='footnoteList'><h6 class='word-formet'> <sup class='en'>3</sup> </h6>The words â€œincludes a Paurashava or a Municipal Corporationâ€ were substituted, for the words â€œincludes a Municipal Corporationâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the <a title='Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973' href='/act-430.html'>Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973</a> (Act No. VIII of 1973)</li> <li class='footnoteList'><h6 class='word-formet'> <sup class='en'>4</sup> </h6>The words, commas and figures â€œthe <a title='Army Act, 1952' href='/act-248.html'>Army Act, 1952</a>, the Naval Discipline Ordinance, 1961 or the <a title='Air Force Act, 1953' href='/act-256.html'>Air Force Act, 1953</a>â€ were substituted, for the words, commas, figures and bracket â€œthe Army Act, the Indian Army Act, 1911 or the Pakistan <a title='Army Act, 1952' href='/act-248.html'>Army Act, 1952</a>, the Naval Discipline Act or that Act as modified by the Pakistan Navy (Discipline) Act, 1934, the Air Force Act or the Indian Air Force Act, 1932 or the Pakistan <a title='Air Force Act, 1953' href='/act-256.html'>Air Force Act, 1953</a>â€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the <a title='Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973' href='/act-430.html'>Bangladesh Laws (Revision And Declaration) Act, 1973</a> (Act No. VIII of 1973)</li>

            </ul>
        </div>

        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('.test-tooltip').tooltip();
            // find tags and remove
            // remove empty p tag
            $('p').each(function () {
                var $this = $(this);
                if ($this.html().replace(/\s|&nbsp;/g, '').length == 0)
                    $this.remove();
            });


            $(document).on('click','.advancedSearch',function (event) {
                console.log(event);
                $('.advancedSearchForm').toggle("slow");
            })

            $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
            String.prototype.bn_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/0/g,'à§¦')
                        .replace(/1/g,'à§§')
                        .replace(/2/g,'à§¨')
                        .replace(/3/g,'à§©')
                        .replace(/4/g,'à§ª')
                        .replace(/5/g,'à§«')
                        .replace(/6/g,'à§¬')
                        .replace(/7/g,'à§­')
                        .replace(/8/g,'à§®')
                        .replace(/9/g,'à§¯');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }



            String.prototype.en_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/à§¦/g,'0')
                        .replace(/à§§/g,'1')
                        .replace(/à§¨/g,'2')
                        .replace(/à§©/g,'3')
                        .replace(/à§ª/g,'4')
                        .replace(/à§«/g,'5')
                        .replace(/à§¬/g,'6')
                        .replace(/à§­/g,'7')
                        .replace(/à§®/g,'8')
                        .replace(/à§¯/g,'9');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-td-index]",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var filter = [];

                $(this).parents("form").find("[data-td-index]").each(function (index){
                    if ($(this).val().trim()!="" && $(this).val()!=null){
                        filter.push(
                                {
                                    "bn": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number(),
                                    "en": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number(),
                                    "td": $(this).data("td-index")
                                }
                        )
                     }
                })


                var trs = table.find("tbody tr");

                $.each(trs, function (index, tr) {
                    var rowShow = true;
                    $.each(filter, function (ind, val){
                        console.log(val);
                        var td = $(tr).find("td").get(val["td"]);
                        var text = $(td).text();

                        if (text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["en"]) > -1
                        || text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["bn"]) > -1){
                            rowShow = rowShow && true;
                        }else{
                            rowShow = false;
                        }
                    })
                    if (rowShow==true){
                        $(tr).show();
                    }else{
                        $(tr).hide();
                    }
                } )

            })

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-search]",function () {


                var searchContent = $(this).data("search");

                var filter1 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number();
                var filter2 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number();


                var rows = $(document).find(searchContent);


                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {

                    var row = rows[i];
                    if (row) {
                        if ($(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter1) > -1
                                ||$(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter2) > -1
                        ) {
                            $(row).show();
                        } else {
                            $(row).hide();
                        }
                    }
                }
            })

            $(document).find(".removableRowTable").each(function (index) {
                console.log($(this).find("tbody tr").length);
                $(this).find("tbody").each(function () {
                    if ($(this).find("tr").length<=1){
                        $(this).remove();
                    }
                })
            })


            $(document).on("reset","form",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var tr = table.find("tbody tr");
                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < tr.length; i++) {

                    tr[i].style.display = "";

                }
            })

        });

                text: '<i class="fa fa-chevron-circle-up" aria-hidden="true"></i>Top', // Text for element, can contain HTML

                skin: null,
                throttle: 250,

                namespace: 'scrollToTop'
            });
        });
        function validateForm(){
            var name=document.contactUsForm.name.value;
            var message=document.contactUsForm.message.value;
            var email=document.contactUsForm.email.value;

            if (name==null || name==""){
                alert("Name can't be blank");
                return false;
            }else if(email==null || email==""){
                alert("Email can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
            else if(message==null || message==""){
                alert("Message can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
        }

                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    2. In this Act â€œMunicipal Committeeâ€  <span class='footnote'  title='The words â€œincludes a Paurashava or a Municipal Corporationâ€ were substituted, for the words â€œincludes a Municipal Corporationâ€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >3</a></sup></span></span>[includes a Paurashava or a Municipal Corporation] or a body of Municipal Commissioners constituted by or under the provisions of any enactment for the time being in force. 

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Power to prohibit levy of tax

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    3. Notwithstanding anything contained in any enactment for the time being in force, the Government may, by an order in writing, prohibit the levy by a Municipal Committee of any specified tax-	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>(a)	payable by any person subject to  <span class='footnote'  title='The words, commas and figures â€œthe Army Act, 1952, the Naval Discipline Ordinance, 1961 or the Air Force Act, 1953â€ were substituted, for the words, commas, figures and bracket â€œthe Army Act, the Indian Army Act, 1911 or the Pakistan Army Act, 1952, the Naval Discipline Act or that Act as modified by the Pakistan Navy (Discipline) Act, 1934, the Air Force Act or the Indian Air Force Act, 1932 or the Pakistan Air Force Act, 1953â€ by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >4</a></sup></span></span>[the <a title='Army Act, 1952' href='/act-248.html'>Army Act, 1952</a>, the Naval Discipline Ordinance, 1961 or 	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>the <a title='Air Force Act, 1953' href='/act-256.html'>Air Force Act, 1953</a>]  who is compelled by the exigencies of Military, Naval or Air-force duty to reside within the limits of a municipality;	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	The Government may, by a like order, rescind any such prohibition.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Power of Government to prohibit levy of taxes on it

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	3A. 	Notwithstanding anything in any enactment for the time being in force, the Government may by an order in writing prohibit the levy by a Municipal Committee of any specified tax payable by the Government and may by a like order rescind any such prohibition.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Government to pay taxes referred to in section 3

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	4. So long as any order made under section 3, prohibiting the levy of a tax on any person mentioned in that section remains in force, the Government shall be liable to pay to the Municipal Committee mentioned in the order the amount which otherwise would have been payable to such Committee by such person:<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>	Provided that the Government shall not be liable to pay any sum in respect of any horse which such person is bound, by the regulations of the service to which he belongs, to keep.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Payments to be made in lieu of taxes referred to in section 3A

                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	5. So long as any order made under section 3A prohibiting the levy of any tax payable by the Government, remains in force, the said Government shall be liable to pay to the Municipal Committee, in lieu of such tax, such sums (if any) as an officer from time to time appointed in this behalf by the Government may, having regard to all the circumstances of the case, from time to time determine to be fair and reasonable.

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>
            
            
        

            <div class="row lineremoves ">
                

                

                

                    
                    
                

                <div class="col-sm-3 txt-head" style="width: 18%;float: left;">
                    
                        
                        
                        
                        
                            
                            
                            
                            Decision of questions arising under this Act




                            
                            
                        
                        
                        
                        
                    
                </div>
                <div class="col-sm-9 txt-details" id="sec-dec" style="text-align: justify;width: 82%; float:right">
                    
                    	6. If any question arises whether any duty is military, naval or air-force duty within the meaning of this Act, the decision of the Government thereon shall be conclusive.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>If any question arises whether any person is compelled as aforesaid to reside within the limits of a municipality or is bound as aforesaid to keep any horse, the decision thereon of such authority as the Government may, from time to time, appoint in this behalf shall be conclusive.<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="na">&nbsp;</div>

                    
                    


                    
                    

                    
                    
                </div>
            </div>

        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('.test-tooltip').tooltip();
            // find tags and remove
            // remove empty p tag
            $('p').each(function () {
                var $this = $(this);
                if ($this.html().replace(/\s|&nbsp;/g, '').length == 0)
                    $this.remove();
            });


            $(document).on('click','.advancedSearch',function (event) {
                console.log(event);
                $('.advancedSearchForm').toggle("slow");
            })

            $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
            String.prototype.bn_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/0/g,'à§¦')
                        .replace(/1/g,'à§§')
                        .replace(/2/g,'à§¨')
                        .replace(/3/g,'à§©')
                        .replace(/4/g,'à§ª')
                        .replace(/5/g,'à§«')
                        .replace(/6/g,'à§¬')
                        .replace(/7/g,'à§­')
                        .replace(/8/g,'à§®')
                        .replace(/9/g,'à§¯');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }



            String.prototype.en_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/à§¦/g,'0')
                        .replace(/à§§/g,'1')
                        .replace(/à§¨/g,'2')
                        .replace(/à§©/g,'3')
                        .replace(/à§ª/g,'4')
                        .replace(/à§«/g,'5')
                        .replace(/à§¬/g,'6')
                        .replace(/à§­/g,'7')
                        .replace(/à§®/g,'8')
                        .replace(/à§¯/g,'9');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-td-index]",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var filter = [];

                $(this).parents("form").find("[data-td-index]").each(function (index){
                    if ($(this).val().trim()!="" && $(this).val()!=null){
                        filter.push(
                                {
                                    "bn": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number(),
                                    "en": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number(),
                                    "td": $(this).data("td-index")
                                }
                        )
                     }
                })


                var trs = table.find("tbody tr");

                $.each(trs, function (index, tr) {
                    var rowShow = true;
                    $.each(filter, function (ind, val){
                        console.log(val);
                        var td = $(tr).find("td").get(val["td"]);
                        var text = $(td).text();

                        if (text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["en"]) > -1
                        || text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["bn"]) > -1){
                            rowShow = rowShow && true;
                        }else{
                            rowShow = false;
                        }
                    })
                    if (rowShow==true){
                        $(tr).show();
                    }else{
                        $(tr).hide();
                    }
                } )

            })

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-search]",function () {


                var searchContent = $(this).data("search");

                var filter1 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number();
                var filter2 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number();


                var rows = $(document).find(searchContent);


                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {

                    var row = rows[i];
                    if (row) {
                        if ($(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter1) > -1
                                ||$(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter2) > -1
                        ) {
                            $(row).show();
                        } else {
                            $(row).hide();
                        }
                    }
                }
            })

            $(document).find(".removableRowTable").each(function (index) {
                console.log($(this).find("tbody tr").length);
                $(this).find("tbody").each(function () {
                    if ($(this).find("tr").length<=1){
                        $(this).remove();
                    }
                })
            })


            $(document).on("reset","form",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var tr = table.find("tbody tr");
                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < tr.length; i++) {

                    tr[i].style.display = "";

                }
            })

        });

                skin: null,
                throttle: 250,

                namespace: 'scrollToTop'
            });
        });
        function validateForm(){
            var name=document.contactUsForm.name.value;
            var message=document.contactUsForm.message.value;
            var email=document.contactUsForm.email.value;

            if (name==null || name==""){
                alert("Name can't be blank");
                return false;
            }else if(email==null || email==""){
                alert("Email can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
            else if(message==null || message==""){
                alert("Message can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
        }

                <div class="text-center">
                    <h3>
                        The Obstructions in Fairways Act, 1881 

                        
                        
                    </h3>
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                    
                        <h4 style="color: #fff;"> (
                            
                                
                                
                                    
                                        
                                        ACT
                                    
                                    NO. XVI OF 1881

        <div class="row">
            <div class="col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-12 col-lg-12 lineremove">
                
                    

                        <div class="row">
                            <div class="col-md-2"></div>
                            <div class="col-md-10 text-center act-role-style">
                                
                                <strong>
                                    <span class='footnote' href='#' title='Throughout this Act, except otherwise provided, the words â€œBangladeshâ€ and â€œGovernmentâ€ were substituted, for the words â€œPakistanâ€ and â€œCentral Governmentâ€ respectively by section 3 and 2nd Schedule of the Bangladesh Laws (Revision and Declaration) Act, 1973 (Act No. VIII of 1973)'><span class='word-formet'><sup class='en'><a href='1' >1</a></sup></span></span>â™£An Act to empower the Government to remove or destroy obstructions in fairways, and to prevent the creation of such obstructions.

                                    
                                    
                                </strong>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <div class="row">

                            <div class="col-md-10">

                                
                                <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>   <div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div><div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>WHEREAS it is expedient to empower the Government to remove or destroy obstructions to navigation in fairways leading to ports in Bangladesh and to prevent the creation of such obstructions; It is hereby enacted as follows:-<div class="clbr">&nbsp;</div>

                                
                                
                            </div>
                        </div>

10.	Compensation payable in certain cases for damage caused under this Act

<script>

        $(document).ready(function() {
            $('.test-tooltip').tooltip();
            // find tags and remove
            // remove empty p tag
            $('p').each(function () {
                var $this = $(this);
                if ($this.html().replace(/\s|&nbsp;/g, '').length == 0)
                    $this.remove();
            });


            $(document).on('click','.advancedSearch',function (event) {
                console.log(event);
                $('.advancedSearchForm').toggle("slow");
            })

            $('[data-toggle="tooltip"]').tooltip();
            String.prototype.bn_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/0/g,'à§¦')
                        .replace(/1/g,'à§§')
                        .replace(/2/g,'à§¨')
                        .replace(/3/g,'à§©')
                        .replace(/4/g,'à§ª')
                        .replace(/5/g,'à§«')
                        .replace(/6/g,'à§¬')
                        .replace(/7/g,'à§­')
                        .replace(/8/g,'à§®')
                        .replace(/9/g,'à§¯');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }



            String.prototype.en_number = function(){
                var b = String (this);
                var c = b.replace(/à§¦/g,'0')
                        .replace(/à§§/g,'1')
                        .replace(/à§¨/g,'2')
                        .replace(/à§©/g,'3')
                        .replace(/à§ª/g,'4')
                        .replace(/à§«/g,'5')
                        .replace(/à§¬/g,'6')
                        .replace(/à§­/g,'7')
                        .replace(/à§®/g,'8')
                        .replace(/à§¯/g,'9');
                //console.log(c);
                return c;
            }

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-td-index]",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var filter = [];

                $(this).parents("form").find("[data-td-index]").each(function (index){
                    if ($(this).val().trim()!="" && $(this).val()!=null){
                        filter.push(
                                {
                                    "bn": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number(),
                                    "en": $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number(),
                                    "td": $(this).data("td-index")
                                }
                        )
                     }
                })


                var trs = table.find("tbody tr");

                $.each(trs, function (index, tr) {
                    var rowShow = true;
                    $.each(filter, function (ind, val){
                        console.log(val);
                        var td = $(tr).find("td").get(val["td"]);
                        var text = $(td).text();

                        if (text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["en"]) > -1
                        || text.toUpperCase().indexOf(val["bn"]) > -1){
                            rowShow = rowShow && true;
                        }else{
                            rowShow = false;
                        }
                    })
                    if (rowShow==true){
                        $(tr).show();
                    }else{
                        $(tr).hide();
                    }
                } )

            })

            $(document).on("keyup","[data-search]",function () {


                var searchContent = $(this).data("search");

                var filter1 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().bn_number();
                var filter2 = $(this).val().trim().toUpperCase().en_number();


                var rows = $(document).find(searchContent);


                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < rows.length; i++) {

                    var row = rows[i];
                    if (row) {
                        if ($(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter1) > -1
                                ||$(row).text().toUpperCase().indexOf(filter2) > -1
                        ) {
                            $(row).show();
                        } else {
                            $(row).hide();
                        }
                    }
                }
            })

            $(document).find(".removableRowTable").each(function (index) {
                console.log($(this).find("tbody tr").length);
                $(this).find("tbody").each(function () {
                    if ($(this).find("tr").length<=1){
                        $(this).remove();
                    }
                })
            })


            $(document).on("reset","form",function () {

                var table = $(".table-search");
                var tr = table.find("tbody tr");
                // Loop through all table rows, and hide those who don't match the search query
                for (i = 0; i < tr.length; i++) {

                    tr[i].style.display = "";

                }
            })

        });

                },

                trigger: null, // Set a custom triggering element. Can be an HTML string or jQuery object
                target: null, // Set a custom target element for scrolling to. Can be element or number
                text: '<i class="fa fa-chevron-circle-up" aria-hidden="true"></i>Top', // Text for element, can contain HTML

                skin: null,
                throttle: 250,

                namespace: 'scrollToTop'
            });
        });
        function validateForm(){
            var name=document.contactUsForm.name.value;
            var message=document.contactUsForm.message.value;
            var email=document.contactUsForm.email.value;

            if (name==null || name==""){
                alert("Name can't be blank");
                return false;
            }else if(email==null || email==""){
                alert("Email can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
            else if(message==null || message==""){
                alert("Message can't be blank");
                return false;
            }
        }
